      public boolean keepRegionEvent(WAL.Entry entry)
      Description copied from class: OutputSink
      Some WALEdit's contain only KV's for account on what happened to a region. Not all sinks will want to get all of those edits.
      Specified by:
      keepRegionEvent in class OutputSink
      Returns:
      Return true if this sink wants to accept this region-level WALEdit.

    • requiresReplication

      private boolean requiresReplication(TableName tableName, List<WAL.Entry> entries) throws IOException
      returns true if the specified entry must be replicated. We should always replicate meta operations (e.g. flush) and use the user HTD flag to decide whether or not replicate the memstore.
      Throws:
      IOException
